On Sep 18, 2009, at 7:20 PM, Bill Burke wrote:

>
>
> Jan Algermissen wrote:
>> On Sep 18, 2009, at 4:27 PM, Bill Burke wrote:
>>>
>>> If you have any other suggestions, let me know:
>>>
>> I think the term "REST-*" is really conveying the wrong image. Any  
>> chance to change that?
>
> Are the changes what you wanted?

I have not taken an analytical look at the new wording, but I think it  
is quite impressive that you were able to come up with these (based on  
my short look)rather radical changes in a very short time!


> Or was it all you were hung up on was the name?
>

No, not just the name. But the name is really too close to WS-*.

Jan
